## BIO

Am a skilled Systems Engineer at Infosys, specializing in the Testing Domain since September 2021. I holds a degree in Mechanical Engineering from Vasavi College of Engineering and has a strong academic background, including certifications in Renewable Energy and Thermodynamics. Apart from my professional endeavors,I have  showcased my engineering prowess through a project on the "Design and Development of 3 Degrees of Freedom Delta Robot" during his undergraduate years.
